trans-unit.source: Enables or disables Desktop Window Manager (DWM) composition

seg-source.mrk: Enables or disables Desktop Window Manager (DWM) composition

target.mrk: Enables or disables Desktop Window Manager (DWM) composition

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether enable or disable DWM composition, valid values:

seg-source.mrk: Specifies whether enable or disable DWM composition, valid values:

target.mrk: Specifies whether enable or disable DWM composition, valid values:

trans-unit.source: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the HRESULT error code.

seg-source.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the HRESULT error code.

target.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the HRESULT error code.

trans-unit.source: Disabling DWM composition disables it for the entire desktop.

seg-source.mrk: Disabling DWM composition disables it for the entire desktop.

target.mrk: Disabling DWM composition disables it for the entire desktop.

trans-unit.source: DWM composition will be automatically enabled when all processes that have disabled composition have called _WinAPI_DwmEnableComposition() to enable it or have been terminated.

seg-source.mrk: DWM composition will be automatically enabled when all processes that have disabled composition have called _WinAPI_DwmEnableComposition() to enable it or have been terminated.

target.mrk: DWM composition will be automatically enabled when all processes that have disabled composition have called _WinAPI_DwmEnableComposition() to enable it or have been terminated.

trans-unit.source: The WM_DWMCOMPOSITIONCHANGED notification is sent when DWM composition has enabled or disabled.

seg-source.mrk: The WM_DWMCOMPOSITIONCHANGED notification is sent when DWM composition has enabled or disabled.

target.mrk: The WM_DWMCOMPOSITIONCHANGED notification is sent when DWM composition has enabled or disabled.

trans-unit.source: This function requires Windows Vista or later.

seg-source.mrk: This function requires Windows Vista or later.

target.mrk: This function requires Windows Vista or later.
